  • Uses of ExportView in org.displaytag.export

    Subinterfaces of ExportView in org.displaytag.export
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    BinaryExportView
    Main interface for exportViews which need to output binary data.
    interface 
    TextExportView
    Main interface for exportViews which need to output character data.
    Classes in org.displaytag.export that implement ExportView
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BaseExportView
    Base abstract class for simple export views.
    class 
    CsvView
    Export view for comma separated value exporting.
    class 
    DefaultItextExportView
    Exporter using iText: subclasses export to any of the iText document types, such as PDF and RTF.
    class 
    DefaultPdfExportView
    PDF exporter using iText.
    class 
    ExcelView
    Export view for excel exporting.
    class 
    FopExportView
    Exports the data to a totaled xml format, and then transforms that data using XSL-FO to a pdf.
    class 
    PdfView
    PDF exporter using IText.
    class 
    XmlView
    Export view for xml exporting.
    Methods in org.displaytag.export that return ExportView
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ExportView
    ExportViewFactory.getView(MediaTypeEnum exportType, TableModel tableModel, boolean exportFullList, boolean includeHeader, boolean decorateValues)
    returns an instance of export view associated with the given export type.

  • Uses of ExportView in org.displaytag.export.excel

    Classes in org.displaytag.export.excel that implement ExportView
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DefaultHssfExportView
    Excel exporter using POI.
    class 
    ExcelHssfView
    Excel exporter using POI HSSF.
    class 
    HssfDoubleExportView
    If you are doing an export, and do not know if the user would like a view that is grouped or a view that is raw, just use this one; it will export one tab that is grouped, and one tab that is not.
